entities.name: bella
entities.description: Bella is the one who is speaking to Narcissa and trying to convince her not to speak of the plan. She says 'The Dark Lord is ... I believe ... mistaken' (line 1).

entities.name: narcissa
entities.description: Narcissa is Bella's sister and she is being threatened by Bella. She says 'There is nothing I wouldn’t do any more!' (line 10).

entities.name: the dark lord
entities.description: The Dark Lord is mentioned as the one who has a plan that Bella and Narcissa are trying to keep secret. He is referred to as 'the Dark Lord's' (line 6).

entities.name: spinner's end
entities.description: Spinner's End is a street where Narcissa and Bella are moving deeper into. It is mentioned in line 17.

relationships.description: Bella and Narcissa are sisters, as mentioned in the conversation between them. Bella says 'Cissy , your own sister? You wouldn’t –' (line 8).
Bella is threatening Narcissa with her wand, as mentioned in line 5. Narcissa says 'Let go, Bella!' (line 4).
Bella is pursuing Narcissa as they move deeper into the labyrinth of brick houses, as mentioned in line 12.
